
``viewHMRFresults_V2``
==========================

viewHMRFresults_V2

Description
-----------

function to plot spatial location with HMRF cluster of k and betas

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   viewHMRFresults_V2(gobject, HMRFoutput, k, betas, third_dim = FALSE, ...)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``gobject``
     - TBD
   * - ``HMRFoutput``
     - TBD
   * - ``k``
     - TBD
   * - ``betas``
     - TBD
   * - ``third_dim``
     - TBD
   * - ``...``
     -
